00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Packet buffer defines.
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 95816 $<hr>
00046  *
00047  */
00048 
00049 #ifndef __CVMX_PACKET_H__
00050 #define __CVMX_PACKET_H__
00051 
00052 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00053 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00054 extern "C" {
00055 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 union cvmx_buf_ptr_pki {
00059     uint64_t u64;
00060     struct {
00061         CVMX_BITFIELD_FIELD(uint64_t size:16,
00062         /**< The size of the segment pointed to by addr (in bytes) */
00063         CVMX_BITFIELD_FIELD(uint64_t packet_outside_wqe:1,
00064         /**< sets is packet is not stored in same buffer as WQE*/
00065         CVMX_BITFIELD_FIELD(uint64_t rsvd0:5,
00066         CVMX_BITFIELD_FIELD(uint64_t addr:42,   /**< Pointer to the first byte of the data, NOT buffer */
00067         ))));
00068     };
00069 };
00070 
00071 typedef union cvmx_buf_ptr_pki cvmx_buf_ptr_pki_t;
00072 
00073 /**
00074  * This structure defines a buffer pointer on Octeon
00075  */
00076 union cvmx_buf_ptr {
00077     void *ptr;
00078     uint64_t u64;
00079     struct {
00080 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00081         uint64_t i:1;
00082                   /**< if set, invert the "free" pick of the overall packet. HW always sets this bit to 0 on inbound packet */
00083         uint64_t back:4;
00084                   /**< Indicates the amount to back up to get to the buffer start in cache lines. In most cases
00085                                 this is less than one complete cache line, so the value is zero */
00086         uint64_t pool:3;
00087                   /**< The pool that the buffer came from / goes to */
00088         uint64_t size:16;
00089                   /**< The size of the segment pointed to by addr (in bytes) */
00090         uint64_t addr:40;
00091                   /**< Pointer to the first byte of the data, NOT buffer */
00092 #else
00093         uint64_t addr:40;
00094         uint64_t size:16;
00095         uint64_t pool:3;
00096         uint64_t back:4;
00097         uint64_t i:1;
00098 #endif
00099     } s;
00100 };
00101 
00102 typedef union cvmx_buf_ptr cvmx_buf_ptr_t;
00103 
00104 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00105 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00106 }
00107 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00108 #endif
00109 #endif /*  __CVMX_PACKET_H__ */
